engine.rendering

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.rendering.Texture

  • public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a renderable texture.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Texture(IRenderDevice device, ArrayBitmap image, int filter)
      Creates a texture that can be rendered by a particular IRenderDevice.

      Gets the integer identifying this texture on it's associated IRenderDevice

    • Constructor Detail

      • Texture

        public Texture(IRenderDevice device,
       ArrayBitmap image,
       int filter)
        Creates a texture that can be rendered by a particular IRenderDevice.
        Parameters:
        device - The device the texture is being created for.
        image - The image being converted into a texture.
        filter - The type of filtering to be used. Should be one of the IRenderDevice.FILTER options.

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Releases this object. This should be called when the object will no longer be used, and no methods or fields should be used after this method is called.

      • getDeviceID

        public int getDeviceID()
        Gets the integer identifying this texture on it's associated IRenderDevice
        Returns:
        The integer identifying this texture on it's associated IRenderDevice

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Gets the width of this texture.
        Returns:
        The width of this texture.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Gets the height of this texture.
        Returns:
        The height of this texture.

      • getPixels

        public ArrayBitmap getPixels()
        Gets an ArrayBitmap containing the pixels of this texture.
        Returns:
        An ArrayBitmap containing the pixels of this texture.

      • getPixels

        public ArrayBitmap getPixels(int x,
                    int y,
                    int width,
                    int height)
        Gets an ArrayBitmap containing the pixels of part of this texture.
        Parameters:
        x - The x location to start getting the texture from.
        y - The y location to start getting the texture from.
        width - How many pixels should be read on x.
        height - How many pixels should be read on y.
        Returns:
        An ArrayBitmap containing the pixels of part of this texture.
